title: Equation
text:
You are given integer positive number N. Find the number of solutions in positive integer numbers of the following equation:1/N! = 1/X + 1/YInputEach line of input file contains one integer number N (1 ≤ N ≤ 104). The last line contains 0 and shouldn't be processed. Number of lines in the input does not exceed 30.OutputFor every line in the input write the answer on a separate line.ExampleInput:1
2
0Output:1
3
